version_description: Bug fixes

• Enabled user comments in stories
• Improved article sharing
• Improved swiping between stories
• Added region for Antelope Valley, CA.
• Updated app icon

- Bug fixes
- Performance improvements
- Time Warner Cable News is now Spectrum-TWC News

- We've added real-time election results so you can stay up-to-date with all of the important 2016 political races happening in your area. Navigate to the Politics section and choose Election Results to follow along.
Minor enhancements

• Bug fixes
• Added traffic map and drive times
• Added ability to go full screen with live stream on tablet devices
• Bug fixes
• Local Sports streams added to New York State region
●   Audio-only streaming now available
• Bug fixes
• Watch more live streaming and on-demand local sports in New York State
• Bug Fixes
◦ Bug fixes
● Bug fixes
● Bug fixes
• Bug fixes
• Bug fixes and enhancements

•Improved iPhone X experience
•Resolved social embed issue preventing the display of some articles
•Other bug fixes and enhancements

• Improved news channel live streaming experience
• Improved live stream authentication button placement
• Addressed error message issue for unauthenticated access
• Other bug fixes and enhancements

• Enhanced display of News and Weather text and imagery
• Improved Search Functionality
• Added Privacy Policy link to the menu
• Other bug fixes and enhancements

∙ Added Ohio, Wisconsin and Southern California regions
∙ Improved social sharing functionality
∙ Other bug fixes and enhancements

∙ Faster, cleaner and more refined experience
∙ Improved social sharing and social media display
∙ Fixed a few live streaming and video playback issues
∙ Additional bug fixes and improvements
∙ Minor updates and bug fixes
・ Fixed bug impacting ability to stream Noticias content
● Minor updates and bug fixes.
● Bug fixes and improvements.
● This update includes bug fixes and performance improvements.
• This update includes bug fixes and improvements.

Spectrum News has been redesigned to better serve our communities with local news, weather forecasts and more. Updates include:

• Live streams for all Spectrum News networks available for all Spectrum customers*
• Access to exclusive content from Spectrum News journalists and local partners
• Improved login experience
• Stability enhancements
• Performance upgrades

We’d love to hear what you think, so please consider leaving a review!

Have a question or suggestion? Tap “Send Feedback” in the app or visit https://spectrumlocalnews.com/app-feedback

*Not currently available for SMB or enterprise customers or Spectrum customers receiving mobile service only.

Spectrum News has been redesigned to better serve our communities with local news, weather forecasts and more.

New in this version:
• You can now use the app while connected to VPN
• Bug fixes and performance improvements

We’d love to hear what you think, so please leave a review!
• We fixed a few bugs to bring you a better app experience.

• Now you can listen to our live news networks in the background.
• We translated much of our interface for Spectrum Noticias NY1 customers who have their device language set to Spanish.
• We fixed a few bugs to bring you a better app experience.
